mapper.sql: participants AS "participants",user_id AS "userId",coding AS "coding",status AS "status", position_id AS "positionId",complete AS "complete", notice AS "notice",end_time AS "endTime", begin_time AS "beginTime",mode AS "mode",method as "method", inventory_task_id AS "inventoryTaskId", inventory_task_name AS "inventoryTaskName", remark AS "remark", display AS "display", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_inventory where 1 = 1
and inventory_task_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryTaskId},'%')
and inventory_task_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryTaskName},'%')
and remark like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.remark},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')

select
from daoxin_erp_inventory where 1 = 1
and inventory_task_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryTaskId},'%')
and inventory_task_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryTaskName},'%')

and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')

select
from daoxin_erp_inventory where 1 = 1
and inventory_task_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryTaskId},'%')
and inventory_task_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryTaskName},'%')
and remark like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.remark},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and complete = #{paramCondition.complete}

select
from daoxin_erp_inventory where 1 = 1 and position_id is not null
and position_id = #{paramCondition.positionId}
and inventory_task_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryTaskId},'%')
and inventory_task_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryTaskName},'%')
and remark like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.remark},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')

from daoxin_erp_inventory where 1 = 1
and inventory_task_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryTaskId},'%')
and inventory_task_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryTaskName},'%')
